Plot: Tim has a romantic date to watch the start of the Tour the France in Utrecht with his girl. But he ends up at the wrong side of the barriers and has to find a way to get to her.
Title: Le Tour Utrecht: Bon Voyage!
Writer: Marieke Blaauw, Joris Oprins, Job Roggeveen
Director: Marieke Blaauw, Joris Oprins, Job Roggeveen
